<?php

$map = $elastic->index()

->name(‘my-index’) ->mappings(function(){

return $this
->body([
‘properties’ => [
‘location.keyword’ => [

‘type’ => ‘geo_shape’,

]

]

]) ->getMap();

}) ->getMap(); // it returns map

return $map;

// You will get something like that: /* {“index”:”my-index”,”body”:{“mappings”:{“properties”:{“location.keyword”:{“ty pe”:”geo_shape”}}}}} */
